page.title: 09LONGBOROUGH CHURCH 2
page.content: Since 1967 the church tower has been declared unsafe to ring the bells.The last estimate was that Â£15 000 was required to repair the bells & frame.At present one bell is tolled by Mr. F.Tustin five minutes before the service. A Village Flower Festival was held in June & the Church was decorated by the Moreton Ladies Flower Arranging Circle.Many village gardens were open.An Art Exhibition of the children's work was held in the school.A barn dance was held in Upper Town Barn.A choral evening aws held in the church.A display of veteran cars was held in the yard at Manor Farm. Refreshments were served in the village hall. Over Â£500 was raised towards the church funds.
